response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,500,000 to you, and I am confident it will meet your expectations and contribute greatly to your endeavors.

I am offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This is a generous offer designed to ensure you have the chance to own something truly extraordinary without incurring the full market value.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and assist you through the process.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
